resources.string: Welcome To Wayne County Community College District Information Technology Institute Career Programs
The Computer Information Systems: Application Developer certificate is designed to prepare students for mobile application development.

The Computer Information Systems: Database Administrator certification is designed to give students a technical foundation to design and implement the infrastructure for business solutions using database tools.

The Computer Information Systems Associate of Applied Science degree program is designed to provide a solid foundation in the fundamental skills that are generally required to analyze system requirements and design solutions, or to support and manage the application of technology resources.

The Computer Information Systems Network Administrator College Certificate is designed to provide a solid foundation in the fundamental skills that are generally required to analyze system requirements and design solutions or, to support and manage the application of technology resources.

The Computer Information Systems Computer Support Specialist Short-Term Certificate program is designed to provide a solid foundation in the fundamental skills that are generally required to analyze system requirements and design solutions or to support and manage the application of technology resources.

This program is based on the National Initiative for Cybersecurity Education (NICE) framework and provide students with a solid foundation in the fundamentals of secure information technology system design, construction, and maintenance of Cyber infrastructure and systems defense.

This program is based on the National Initiative for Cybersecurity Education (NICE) framework and provide students with a solid foundation in the fundamentals of secure information technology system design, construction, and maintenance of Cyber infrastructure and systems defense.

The Computer Information Systems Video Game Design and Animation College Certificate is designed to provide a solid foundation in the fundamental skills that are generally required to meet the needs of the video game design, animation and programming field.
The Computer Information Systems Website Developer College Certificate program is designed to prepare students for employment in the area of web design.
